meanings.definition: Clever or cunning devices or expedients, especially as used to trick or deceive others.
meanings.sent1: The magician's bag was full of artifices to surprise the audience.
meanings.sent2: The spy used various artifices to gather information without being noticed.
meanings.sent3: The artifices of the clever fox outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an artifice to hide her true feelings of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The artifices of the puzzle kept the children entertained for hours.

meanings.definition: Skill or ingenuity in devising or executing something.
meanings.sent1: His artifices in painting were admired by all who saw his work.
meanings.sent2: The architect's artifices in designing the building made it stand out in the city.
meanings.sent3: The chef's artifices in creating new recipes always delighted the customers.
meanings.sent4: Her artifices in crafting jewelry were unmatched in the artisan community.
meanings.sent5: The artifices of the musician's compositions touched the hearts of many listeners.
